name: TextDrawSetOutline
tips: If you want to change the outline of a textdraw that is already shown, you don't have to recreate it. Simply use TextDrawShowForPlayer/TextDrawShowForAll after modifying the textdraw and the change will be visible.
description: Sets the thickness of a textdraw's text's outline. TextDrawBackgroundColor can be used to change the color.

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The ID of the text draw to set the outline thickness of.

params_body.name: size
params_body.description: The thickness of the outline, as an integer. 0 for no outline.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
